name: Turtles All The Way Down (NiccoloAbate, wrmorales, Yiyang Lu, SeanJTran, Tonik)
name_original: Turtles All The Way Down (NiccoloAbate, wrmorales, Yiyang Lu, SeanJTran, Tonik)
description:
Description:

Turtle snowboarding game, featuring wrap around space.

Follow old trails and create new ones inline to collecting all the gems.

Note: The web build has no sound and is a little buggy; please download the mac / windows build to get the full experience.

Controls:

"A" and "D" to move left and right.
